3 anchovy fillets,2 cloves garlic, finely chopped,½ lemon, juiced,2 tablespoons red wine vinegar,1 large egg yolk,1 tablespoon Dijon mustard,1 dash Worcestershire sauce,¼ cup olive oil,salt and ground black pepper to taste,½ head romaine lettuce, chopped,¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese,2 tablespoons croutons,,
